title: Q&A: Should You Become More Than Friends?
itunes:title: Q&A: Should You Become More Than Friends?
description:
PANTS with Kate Moennig and Leisha Hailey

Produced by Melisa D. Monts and Diamond MPrint Productions

Edited by Diane Kang 

 

Leisha wonders why her dog isn’t getting camera ready like Kate’s dog. Kate can’t name more than five of her favorite Brazilian foods. They then encourage a New York artist to confess her true love for her best friend. Fingers crossed y’all. 

 

Follow us on Twitter @ThePantsPod

Follow us on Instagram @ThePantsPod

Email us: kateandleisha@gmail.com

Music: Carol Parra @csssuxxx

Artwork: Lovefoxxx


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
